2.1.name: wordpress/digressit
2.1.description:
Digress.it lets you comment paragraph by paragraph in the margins of a text.

Since its initial launch, Digress.it has been used by universities, publishers and governments across the world and is cited on various academic and scientific journals as an exemplary online collaboration tool. For some examples check out http://digress.it/examples

  • Support - If you have any questions, there is an active mailing list at https://groups.google.com/group/digressit
  • Try it! - If you would like to use Digress.it but do not have a hosting service - you can register for free at: http://digress.it/wp-register.php
  • Documentation - For more information on how to use Digress.it check out http://digress.it/help/
  • Ex
